title: libert19
author: libert19
content: I was checking my notes, this was one of undone to-dos, completed it today and checked it's price, it was being sold for ~30$ on Element marketplace. I kept holding plenty nfts before in hopes of getting airdrops, they were getting sold for $10-$30 during expectation times, and now no one looks at them, so I didn't kept any hope on this one and got rid of it asap. It looks good tho. Check your eligibility and mint: https://zksync-mint.summon.xyz/Sell: https://element.market/collections/libertas-omnibus-collectionWould require $1 on zksync era to mint and sell.

comments.author: Vispilio
comments.body: I think they keep adding active accounts to the allowlist gradually, so it's worthwhile to keep checking back every once in a while even if you are not eligible as of yet. Being active in the NFT markets in ZKSYNC and having an active wallet in general are some of the criteria,having an omnibus NFT might be a force multiplier in the upcoming expected ZKSYNC airdrop...

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on October 02, 2023, 12:35:33 PMI was checking my notes, this was one of undone to-dos, completed it today and checked it's price, it was being sold for ~30$ on Element marketplace. I kept holding plenty nfts before in hopes of getting airdrops, they were getting sold for $10-$30 during expectation times, and now no one looks at them, so I didn't kept any hope on this one and got rid of it asap. It looks good tho. Check your eligibility and mint: https://zksync-mint.summon.xyz/Sell: https://element.market/collections/libertas-omnibus-collectionWould require $1 on zksync era to mint and sell. Did you ever heard of any layer 2 project given an airdrop based on NFT?  No. Please don's say aptos given an airdrop. Because aptos is a layer 1 project.  Most of the users are thinking they will be eligible for this airdrop from holding the "Libertas omnibus" NFT.  My suggestion is to sell the nft. Otherwise it will be less than 1$ soon.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: @sriyan on October 05, 2023, 03:13:06 AMDid you ever heard of any layer 2 project given an airdrop based on NFT?  No. Please don's say aptos given an airdrop. Because aptos is a layer 1 project.  Most of the users are thinking they will be eligible for this airdrop from holding the "Libertas omnibus" NFT.  My suggestion is to sell the nft. Otherwise it will be less than 1$ soon. Yes, this NFT is unlikely to directly affect the qualification of receiving airdrop, but...But this NFT is used by the service https://trustgo.trustalabs.ai for "Non-Sybil Verified", which in turn is used for Gitcoin passport. And despite the fact that you consider it unnecessary, it is very actively being bought at the current price of about $20.

comments.author: WalkerIVIV
comments.body: Quote from: @sriyan on October 05, 2023, 03:13:06 AMQuote from: libert19 on October 02, 2023, 12:35:33 PMI was checking my notes, this was one of undone to-dos, completed it today and checked it's price, it was being sold for ~30$ on Element marketplace. I kept holding plenty nfts before in hopes of getting airdrops, they were getting sold for $10-$30 during expectation times, and now no one looks at them, so I didn't kept any hope on this one and got rid of it asap. It looks good tho. Check your eligibility and mint: https://zksync-mint.summon.xyz/Sell: https://element.market/collections/libertas-omnibus-collectionWould require $1 on zksync era to mint and sell. Did you ever heard of any layer 2 project given an airdrop based on NFT?  No. Please don's say aptos given an airdrop. Because aptos is a layer 1 project.  Most of the users are thinking they will be eligible for this airdrop from holding the "Libertas omnibus" NFT.  My suggestion is to sell the nft. Otherwise it will be less than 1$ soon. but then again who knows what the qualification would be, seeing from the past the L2 will always trying to add some unique qualification so we don't know whether NFT will affect qualification.but i don't think selling NFT is good idea, after all its only worth not more than $20. i guess better have chance of airdrop.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: WalkerIVIV on October 05, 2023, 10:45:18 PM...but i don't think selling NFT is good idea, after all its only worth not more than $20. i guess better have chance of airdrop.From October 20, all NFT Libertas Omnibus holders "Join the zkSync Guild and secure your role to access upcoming news, new quests, loot drops, and onboard amazing new artists." - https://twitter.com/zksync/status/1715413911657140389 After this announcement, the cost of this NFT increased to $50.

comments.author: cheezcarls
comments.body: As I have checked mine I am not qualified to mint it. But it would be really crazy if we are going to buy that NFT in hopes that it might be a possible “multiplier” of an upcoming airdrop by zkSync Era. Until now, I am still tempted of trying to acquire it at a much lesser price when everything calms down.Just like the Linea Voyage commemorative NFT where we heard about them trading it via P2P for as much as $1k (alpha) and $800 (beta). I also see a post on Facebook months ago that she is trying to sell her Linea Alpha NFT due to emergency reasons and the demand is so high at that time.

comments.author: TakeItEasy
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on October 02, 2023, 12:35:33 PMI was checking my notes, this was one of undone to-dos, completed it today and checked it's price, it was being sold for ~30$ on Element marketplace. I kept holding plenty nfts before in hopes of getting airdrops, they were getting sold for $10-$30 during expectation times, and now no one looks at them, so I didn't kept any hope on this one and got rid of it asap. It looks good tho. Check your eligibility and mint: https://zksync-mint.summon.xyz/Sell: https://element.market/collections/libertas-omnibus-collectionWould require $1 on zksync era to mint and sell. That may be the criteria for the ZkSync Airdrop as many Youtubers and the Airdrop hunters are saying that, as the price of Libertas Omnibus ZkSync Nft was 9$ in the past, and there are 179k users are eligible to mint this NFT. And now we can see the price has been pumped hard as yesterday they announced a role in their Guild that the person who has this NFT will get a role of Libertas Omnibus NFT at ZkSync Discord, so its price pumped in just some hours and its price is 60$.I'm also eligible for it and I'm happy for it, I'm not going to sell it. Holding this NFT may be me some serious reward from the side of ZkSync, it would be the criteria for the ZkSync Airdrop then I hope I will be eligible for this. And my opinion to everyone is not selling it at this cost. If they have two in the wallet then it would be better to sell only from one wallet.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: tvplus006 on October 21, 2023, 06:57:43 PMFrom October 20, all NFT Libertas Omnibus holders "Join the zkSync Guild and secure your role to access upcoming news, new quests, loot drops, and onboard amazing new artists." - https://twitter.com/zksync/status/1715413911657140389 After this announcement, the cost of this NFT increased to $50.In addition, all Libertas Omnibus NFT holders can participate in an airdrop for $100,000 in $DERP tokens - - https://galxe.com/derpDEXcom/campaign/GCPTEUMXKe It is quite possible that this NFT can continue to serve as a criterion for other airdrops that will be released by other projects in the zkSync network.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: NET Libertas Omnibus holders need to fill out a form to get early beta access to the new NFT standards - https://libertas.summon.xyz/ The current price of this NFT is 0.0516 ETH or about $190.https://element.market/collections/libertas-omnibus-collection

comments.author: Sophokles
comments.body: This minting is still open but i think most of the people who got this NFT already minted it years ago. Everybody is expecting these NFT holder will get some kind of rewards or that there will be an allocation for them in the upcoming ZKS airdrop. Otherwise, they don't have any use i think. I have never thought that it would be that valuable, as i have seen these NFT traded below $50  in the bear market. It seems i should have bought one or few of these NFT in case i got any ZKS drop.

comments.author: makishart
comments.body: Quote from: Sophokles on March 05, 2024, 10:24:16 PMThis minting is still open but i think most of the people who got this NFT already minted it years ago. Last year you meant. im holding some libertas omnibus and got decent profit since many people dumped it like it was nothing last season. The bitcoin pump made the hype to the NFT becomes even bigger now. Expecting the price to rally even higher if there will be a news related to the zksync airdrop. Quote from: Sophokles on March 05, 2024, 10:24:16 PMEverybody is expecting these NFT holder will get some kind of rewards or that there will be an allocation for them in the upcoming ZKS airdrop. Otherwise, they don't have any use i think. I have never thought that it would be that valuable, as i have seen these NFT traded below $50  in the bear market. It seems i should have bought one or few of these NFT in case i got any ZKS drop.Since NFT came officially from the ZKsync club, I'm not even doubting the credibility of this NFT to be one of the requirements to receive airdrop in the future. Any NFT released by the projects that have not released tokens can always be valuable. I can also remind you how babylon NFT pass gets pump from 20 to the 200 bucks in a day caused by the hype.

comments.author: MFahad
comments.body: Is it worthy to buy Libertas Omnibus NFT in Zksync network now? There us rumour that ZKsync will gives airdrop on the basis of this nft. when this nft was at the early stage the price was 10$ and now its surges to 200$. If snapshot has already taken as many users saying thay GitHub showing that snapshot taken on 29 Feb then NFT will not gives any profit. Unfortunately I didn't got free nft despite of using main bridge before NFT announcement and also made transaction. currently my volume on ZKsync is more than 10k and 50+ transaction but criteria not announced yet. As far my six sense say that ZKsync will announce airdrop criteria and other details next month. Those who holding this nft will gets tokens hopefully.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: MFahad on March 10, 2024, 07:13:09 AMIs it worthy to buy Libertas Omnibus NFT in Zksync network now? There us rumour that ZKsync will gives airdrop on the basis of this nft. when this nft was at the early stage the price was 10$ and now its surges to 200$. If snapshot has already taken as many users saying thay GitHub showing that snapshot taken on 29 Feb then NFT will not gives any profit. Unfortunately I didn't got free nft despite of using main bridge before NFT announcement and also made transaction. currently my volume on ZKsync is more than 10k and 50+ transaction but criteria not announced yet. As far my six sense say that ZKsync will announce airdrop criteria and other details next month. Those who holding this nft will gets tokens hopefully.This NFT was released in limited quantities, so despite the criteria fulfilled to obtain it, not many were able to receive it. This NFT in the Yalintl network is special, since it is its owners who receive an additional role in the Discord and is one of the criteria in https://guild.xyz/zksync-era
